lead_paragraph: Gen. Abdul Rashid Dostum appears to have issued a veiled threat of turning on his own government, which he said suppresses him and his Uzbek constituency.

byline.contributor: Jawad Sukhanyar and Fahim Abed contributed reporting.

headline.print_headline: Vice President Hints of Turmoil in Afghanistan if He Is Not Given Respect
headline.main: Afghan Vice President Hints That Turmoil Awaits if He Is Not Respected

snippet: Gen. Abdul Rashid Dostum appears to have issued a veiled threat of turning on his own government, which he said suppresses him and his Uzbek constituency....
abstract: Afghan Vice Pres Gen Abdul Rashid Dostum accuses Pres Ashraf Ghani and chief executive Abdullah Abdullah of favoring their own Pashtun and Tajik ethic groups over his Uzbek constituency; threatens retaliation if disrespect continues.
